# allWebsiteDataTypes()

**Type Method**

Returns the set of all the available data types.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func allWebsiteDataTypes() -> Set<String>
```

## Discussion

Potential values in the set are [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebsiteDataRecord] constants.

## Retrieving specific types of data

- **fetchDataRecords(ofTypes:completionHandler:)**: Fetches the specified types of records from the data store.

items.description: Fetches the specified types of records from the data store.
items.name: fetchDataRecords(ofTypes:completionHandler:)
